ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
Optlang is a Python package for solving mathematical optimization problems,
i.e. maximizing or minimizing an objective function over a set of variables
subject to a number of constraints.  Optlang provides a common interface to
a series of optimization tools, so different solver backends can be changed
in a transparent way.
about.summary: optlang - sympy based mathematical programming language

about.description:
Optlang is a Python package for solving mathematical optimization problems,
i.e. maximizing or minimizing an objective function over a set of variables
subject to a number of constraints.  Optlang provides a common interface to
a series of optimization tools, so different solver backends can be changed
in a transparent way.
about.summary: optlang - sympy based mathematical programming language

name: optlang
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "optlang" %}
{% set version = "1.8.3" %}
{% set sha256 = "546a1c375b93734c636125fc1867aadb7e38ec276918960a9082eb12fb2cec5d" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - sympy >=1.12
    - six >=1.9
    - swiglpk >=5.0.12
    - symengine >=0.6.0

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - optlang
    - optlang.tests
    - optlang.tests.data

about:
  home: https://github.com/biosustain/optlang
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: optlang - sympy based mathematical programming language

  description: |
    Optlang is a Python package for solving mathematical optimization problems,
    i.e. maximizing or minimizing an objective function over a set of variables
    subject to a number of constraints.  Optlang provides a common interface to
    a series of optimization tools, so different solver backends can be changed
    in a transparent way.
  doc_url: http://optlang.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/biosustain/optlang

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - druvus
    - Midnighter
    - phantomas1234
    - cdiener
